@graph.name: RaceID Workflow
@graph.description:
Downstream Single-cell RNA analysis with RaceID

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Downstream Single-cell RNA analysis with RaceID](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-raceid/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
